# W6896-23SO70 - Toxic Gas Monitoring Systems Repairs and Maintenance

**Title:** W6896-23SO70 - Toxic Gas Monitoring Systems Repairs and Maintenance

**Reference:** WS4378552256-Doc4527455274

**Publication Date:** April 17, 2024
**Closing Date:** May 15, 2024, at 2:00 PM ET

This is an amendment to a Request for Standing Offer (RSO) from the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PWGSC) for the provision of toxic gas monitoring systems repairs and maintenance services. The Request for Standing Offer (RSO) includes skilled licensed labor, tools, equipment, transportation, supervision, and materials as required by the Department of National Defence (DND).

## Purpose
The standing offer is for the provision of inspections, repairs, and maintenance services for toxic gas monitoring systems at Det Shilo, Shilo, Manitoba. Inspections are to be performed as per frequency indicated in Annex G and repairs and maintenance are to be provided on an "as and when required basis".

## Service Requirements
The standing offer requires the successful supplier to:

* Provide skilled licensed labor as required by the DND.
* Provide tools, equipment, transportation, supervision, and materials necessary to complete the work as specified in the attached specifications.
* Perform inspections as required by the DND and in accordance with Annex G.
* Perform repairs and maintenance as required by the DND and in accordance with the attached specifications.

## Contract Details
The expected contract start date is June 3, 2024, and the expected contract end date is March 31, 2031. The standing offer will be awarded on the basis of lowest price.

## Trade Agreements
This Request for Standing Offer is open to bidders from WTO GPA countries, as well as other countries participating in the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP).

## Regions of Opportunity
Manitoba is the only region where this standing offer will be delivered.

## Contact Information
For more information, please contact Vinay Singh at vinay.singh@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.
